tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE real_time_interactions (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    interaction_time TIMESTAMP,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    feedback TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE feedback (
  feedback_id INT,
  user_id INT,
  feedback_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  feedback_type VARCHAR(50),
  feedback_data TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE users (
  user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
)

CREATE TABLE user_feedback (
  feedback_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id UUID REFERENCES users(user_id),
  feedback_message TEXT NOT NULL,
  feedback_rating INT NOT NULL,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
)

CREATE TABLE user_interactions (
  interaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id UUID REFERENCES users(user_id),
  interaction_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  interaction_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE disaster_reports (
  report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id UUID REFERENCES users(user_id),
  disaster_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  report_description TEXT,
  reported_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
)

CREATE TABLE UserFeedback (
  feedback_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  feedback_text TEXT NOT NULL,
  feedback_rating INT NOT NULL,
  feedback_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE UserLocation (
  location_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  latitude DECIMAL(9,6) NOT NULL,
  longitude DECIMAL(9,6) NOT NULL,
  location_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE IncidentReports (
  report_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  incident_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  incident_details TEXT NOT NULL,
  report_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
